content: p l y m o u t h y a r n® f867 free pattern with our compliments find inspiration www plymouthyarn com nako natural bebe dotted swiss baby throw size approx finished size 26 x 32 materials 3 100g balls natural bebe-shown in color 623 mint needles 24 circular size 7 or size needed to obtain gauge gauge approx 20 sts =4 over pattern pattern is a multiple of 4 + 3 + 20 border sts loosely cast on 131 sts knit 17 row work one ws row as follows k10 purl to last 10 sts k10 begin pattern row 1 rs knit 10 * k3 p1 repeat from * to last 13 sts end k3 k10 row 2 ws k10 purl to last 10 sts end k10 row 3 k10 k1 * p1 k3 repeat from * to last 12 sts end p1 k1 k10 row 4 k10 purl to last 10 sts end k10 repeat row 1-4 until total length is about 30 ending with row 2 or 4 knit 17 row bind off knitwise on ws row weave in all ends 2018 plymouth yarn company 040318jbt abbreviations k = knit p = purl st s = stitch es rs = right side ws = wrong side
